unittitle_ssm: Mary Engelberg Movie Script for The Winner
abstract_ssm: The collection consists of the one movie script by Mary Engelberg entitled The Winner. The movie begins in 1936 in Monessen, PA, and chronicles the rise of a corrupt union official.
corpname_ssm: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
